title: HIROLLOP Elliptical Machines, Magnetic Elliptical Trainers with Digital Monitor & Heart Rate Monitor,Cross Trainer for Home Use, Eliptical Machine 390LB Weight
features: 【16LB Magnetic Innovative Flywheel & 8 Resistance Levels】HIROLLOP Elliptical Machines Provides double resistance levels than the ordinary product, smooth feeling thanks to 16lb flywheel and high gear ratio, no need for any electrical source.8 levels of electronically controlled resistance provide you with ultimate customizable workout experiences from beginner levels to more challenging levels. All stages exerciser can get efficient exercise with different resistance.

【390 LBS Weight Capacity】HIROLLOP Elliptical Trainer boasts a weight capacity of up to 390 LBS, thanks to its 8.2*5.3CM extra-thick commercial steel pipe main frame and heavy-duty base.With its outstanding stability and loading capacity, our Elliptical Machine is built to withstand long-term exercise and provide reliable performance day after day. It is for a long-term exercise workout, not those simple products for only a few months' use.

【Hyper-Quiet Magnetic Drive System】We developed the latest technology magnetic system and eliminates noise, also control the sound at 20DB even after millions of times workout. you can enjoy a peaceful workout experience without disturbing others in your home. No disturbing on working, reading, and sleeping at home.

【Exactly Calculated Data】The digital monitor displays TIME, SPEED, DISTANCE, CALORIES, and PULSE. But it's not just about tracking data - our machine goes above and beyond by dual-calibrating all of the displayed information with serious algorithms. This ensures that the data you see is accurate and reliable, allowing you to make informed decisions about your workout routine and adjust it to achieve your fitness goals.

【Easy-to-move & Store】Don't let a lack of space hold you back from achieving your fitness goals. Our elliptical training machines is designed with your convenience in mind, featuring transport wheels that make it easy to move and store wherever you need it.Say goodbye to bulky and hard-to-move workout equipment and hello to a more convenient and efficient workout routine.
description: HIROLLOP has been established for Three years. We have been committed to researching and developing fitness equipment suitable for the public. Among them, the elliptical machine is our product line with unique technology and the most patents. So that it has been deeply loved by the public in the past 3 years.

HIROLLOP has been iteratively updated for a long time, learning from the shortcomings of the previous elliptical machine, and is committed to creating many perfect elliptical machine. We can confidently say that our elliptical machine is ahead of the world's first-class level, with high-quality manufacturing, world-class fashion design, and strict product development.
Choose HIROLLOP elliptical machine, let you have a fitness body, and high-quality life.
★Sports app and bluetooth Control makes its operation much easier and brings more fun.
★The elliptical trainer is made of a sturdy steel frame.
